div.div:
Sugah - May 23, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.5.1
Not created by migraine sufferer
Limited selection for triggers. There are maybe 5 simple choices.Forces to to enter start time when you enter date. This is not a log for people who really want to track migraines. You couldn't use this to accurately track your migraines and report to your md at all.
Spam

Angel - July 7, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.5.1
LOVE this app! I've tried keeping track of migraines on paper in the past ...
LOVE this app! I've tried keeping track of migraines on paper in the past but never followed through. This app makes it so easy. Thank you!!
Spam

Jessica - August 22, 2010 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 1.5.1
Addition of charts/graphs is fantastic. Would like to see severity and duration ...
Addition of charts/graphs is fantastic. Would like to see severity and duration over last 8 weeks in addition to #. Thanks.
Spam

julie - November 7, 2010 - Motorola Devour with version 1.5.1
Has really helped with tracking my migraines....helps to chart and show my ...
Has really helped with tracking my migraines....helps to chart and show my neurologist!
Spam

MishMish - June 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.5.1
Pretty user friendly. Would like to be able to select more than one drug ...
Pretty user friendly. Would like to be able to select more than one drug for one migraine and note time taken. And do not like mapping new locations.
Spam

Enzo - September 27, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.5.1
Great
I've had migrains for many years. Great way 2 track them and I love the charts and sending by email. Makes dr visits easier. No more pen & paper!
Spam

mab - October 11, 2010 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 1.5.1
For those of us who have both acephalgic and [with pain] - trying to ...
For those of us who have both acephalgic and [with pain] - trying to note whether we have scotoma, phosphenes, etc. would be easier if more options.
Spam

Reid - April 10, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.5.1
I have had Chronic Daily Migraine for over 13 years! This is by far ...
I have had Chronic Daily Migraine for over 13 years! This is by far the best solution for tracking Migraine I have used. Easy to customize! Thank
Spam

Junpei - September 1, 2010 - Motorola XOOM with version 1.5.1
Thank you so much. Just a suggestion though, what about adding a warning signs ...
Thank you so much. Just a suggestion though, what about adding a warning signs option; such as neck aches etc. Thx again.
Spam

Denise - November 5, 2010 - Version 1.5.1
Very helpful for tracking migraines and sharing with neurologist, love charts, ...
Very helpful for tracking migraines and sharing with neurologist, love charts, would like to email them and choose date range.
Spam

Tha 'Slaw - December 12, 2010 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.5.1
Great app - love that you can add your own triggers. Didnt notice that ...
Great app - love that you can add your own triggers. Didnt notice that function at first :)
Spam

Louise - March 19, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 1.5.1
I routinely have HA which last for Hours & Days. I LOVE THIS APP! ...
I routinely have HA which last for Hours & Days. I LOVE THIS APP! I do record EACH time I take meds for the SAME attack as NEW. I Jerrry~Rigged it :-)
Spam

Laila - January 8, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.5.1
Very satisfied, finally a simple way to register attacks. Love that I can define ...
Very satisfied, finally a simple way to register attacks. Love that I can define own triggers and meds.
Spam

Kelly - June 17, 2010 - HTC Desire with version 1.5.1
Amazing app, really pleased with it thanks! Could add "other" to type of medication ...
Amazing app, really pleased with it thanks! Could add "other" to type of medication though?
Spam

Sharon - June 18, 2011 - SEMC Xperia X10 Mini with version 1.5.1
missing a lot of triggers. doesnt list msg, food, wine, cold weather, barometer ...
missing a lot of triggers. doesnt list msg, food, wine, cold weather, barometer readings or allow personal triggers. needs improved. too basic.
Spam

LuckyInLove - October 12, 2010 - Version 1.5.0
Very helpful! Would like to be able to add other choices for symptoms, chose ...
Very helpful! Would like to be able to add other choices for symptoms, chose time format, use 1/2 hrs in duration and more location flexibility.
Spam

Very helpful for finding a pattern in your headaches, and gives me the ability ...
Very helpful for finding a pattern in your headaches, and gives me the ability to track how well different meds work for me.

After 40 minutes of downloading i gave up and canceled it.
Spam

Im loveing this app, but Im having a problem. For some reason the start ...
Im loveing this app, but Im having a problem. For some reason the start time is showing up as 24 hour,but Im putting the time in as 12 hour.

Great tracker. Would prefer to be able to note effectiveness of each medication.

It would be nice if it had an end time instead a duration of hours. Great app though...excited to take even better care of my migraines.

Just what I needed to track my frequency & identify if my preventive med is having an effect. Thanks!

This is just what I was needing! I hoped to have one with my Droid! Works great! My Nuro will actually get full reports now with useful stats! Thanks!
